title: Rename PointFormat -> PointsFormat, and PointReader/Writer too
description: We are missing an 's' in these classes: all other formats are plural.  I'd like to fix for 6.0 ... it touches many files but it's a trivial change.

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Simple, if large, patch.  This is also an index format change for 6.0.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services

LUCENE-7070: insert missing 's' in PointFormat/Reader/Writer
